Package it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RmiServerInterface
    interface RmiServerInterface : the interface have the same method signature of the ClientInterface, and it's necessary to enable the remote call of the client on the Server
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RmiGatherer
    Class RmiGatherer: the class is responsible of the creation of the Registry in the Server where the Rmi gatherer is running and managing the connection of new rmi clients
    RmiServerImpl
    Class RmiServerImpl: the class is a subclass of RmiServerInterface, so it's responsible of the implementation of all the method of the interface, the Impl is linked to the Server where it's running and have a list of the clients rmi connected to the server.
    VirtualRmi
    Class VirtualSocket: the class is a subclass of the Virtual View, so it implements the same features, but it's responsible to effectively manage the communication with the rmi technology.
